titles: A returne to the ministers of London by way of answer to their seasonable exhortations, (so called) directed to their congregations : with sober reproof sent unto them, because of their secret smitings against the despised people called Quakers, whom they have secretly reproached in their said exhortation ... / by E.B.
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Edward Burrough by BM.
